items.sentence: If I'd been there yesterday, I would've talked to Tom about that.
Are you going somewhere this evening, or are you staying at home?
Tom went straight back to Boston as soon as the meeting was over.
Would it be OK if I examined that document a little more closely?
It's often said you should judge people by the company they keep.
Tom told me that he'd go with you to pick Mary up at the station.
The thigh and lower leg are connected by a joint called the knee.
It became apparent that Tom couldn't do what he said he could do.
Tom won't be able to do that on his own. You'll need to help him.
If I'd known the package was from Tom, I wouldn't have opened it.
